sampling_scheme: random momentary prompt and scheduled daily diary
additional_comments: S1 in the paper; no beep information available; some timestamp coding unclear; https://osf.io/7a5de provides a good overview of previous usage of data

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: begin_day_eod
features.coding: unclear

features.name: begin_time_eod
features.coding: unclear

features.name: finish_day_eod
features.coding: unclear

features.name: finish_time_eod
features.coding: unclear

features.name: duration_ema
features.coding: in seconds

features.name: happy
features.coding:
How happy do you feel right now?
0 = Not at all
100 = Extremely

features.name: interaction
features.coding:
unclear coding, but likely: Did you have any social interactions since your last prompt?
0 = no
1 = yes

features.name: dom_sub_you
features.coding:
Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
-50 = Accomodating/Submissive/Timid
50 = Assertive/Dominant/Controlling

features.name: warm_cold_you
features.coding:
Please rate your behavior toward the other person during this interaction.
-50 = Cold/Distant/Hostile
50 = Warm/Friendly/Caring

features.name: happy_interaction
features.coding:
How happy did you feel during the interaction?
0 = Not at all
100 = Extremely
